news.details: Version 383: Changes: - Fixed issue where sometimes only a limited amount of a users custom songs would appear on the song list. - Pause screen no longer comes up in free improv, instead going straight to the main menu. - New winter environment. Bug Fixes: - Fixed being able to grab pen/spray cans with the opposite hand while you're holding them, messing up the paint picker UI. - Updated appearance of campaign challenge progress indicators. - Improved the look of the final trombone you unlock in the campaign. - You can now move the mixed reality stage by re-centering your playspace. - Adjusted mixed reality note background color. - Brand new portal and higher quality environment in mixed reality. - Dynamic shadows for the main spotlight focused on the player. - New spray can models in trombone customization. - New textured spray can which you can use to recolor a trombone without changing the actual texture. - Improvements to how notes are synchronized with the music. - Notes now scroll in before the song starts instead of being present right when the curtains open.

Thank you for playing Trombone Champ: Unflattened! We have a bunch of changes coming soon: - Tons of bug fixes! - Trombone calibration. - Support for more languages. - Improvements to visuals and performance. - Improved mixed reality (on platforms that support it). - New songs and environments. Find our full roadmap on TC.FLAT2VRSTUDIOS.COM (no you can't click this link, open it in a browser)
